text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
I remember Cafe-chan giving me a
souvenir from Lake Akan before. It was a
marimo, a type of algae that grows into
a ball shape.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: It's really cute and soothing to watch♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I should buy that 
marimo-kun a friend to take home♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Oh, by the way, Cafe-chan told me that
there's a place in Lake Akan where you
can see the natural marimo. Should we go
check it out?♪
